reviewText: I hate this DVD. My husband loves it and watches it several times a month. He tries to get me to watch it repeatedly also. He found that the original X-box will play DVDs of all regions so the region wasn't an issue at all for him. I, however now have no space on the bedroom entertainment center as the X-box has reclaimed its former space permanently.
This movie demonstrated the plight of many forest/bush firefighters, made more interesting knowing it is based on the life of a real firefighter.

When I saw this movie on television, I loved it. It's a bit of an older movie, but being based on actual events just made me like it more. Being an older recording, though, it's not the best picture, not HD or even near HD.
